SharedVision.Sett.None.Name: Actor permission: None
SharedVision.Sett.None.Hint: Always share token vision for tokens with 'none' permission
SharedVision.Sett.Limited.Name: Actor permission: Limited
SharedVision.Sett.Limited.Hint: Always share token vision for tokens with 'limited' permission
SharedVision.Sett.Observer.Name: Actor permission: Observer
SharedVision.Sett.Observer.Hint: Always share token vision for tokens with 'observer' permission
SharedVision.Sett.Owner.Name: Actor permission: Owner
SharedVision.Sett.Owner.Hint: Always share token vision for tokens with 'owner' permission
SharedVision.ActorConf.Global.Note: Configure whether this actor should share its vision with all users when the 'Enable Shared Vision' control button is enabled.
SharedVision.ActorConf.Global.Label: Global Shared Vision
SharedVision.ActorConf.Hidden.Note: Share vision for tokens that are hidden/invisible.
SharedVision.ActorConf.Hidden.Label: Share Hidden
SharedVision.ActorConf.User.Note: Configure whether this actor should always share vision with specific users, regardless of if the 'Enable Shared Vision' control button is enabled.
